title: Travel Trove
description: A responsive travel app built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Firebase, featuring user authentication, dynamic pages, and search functionality.

title: CodePen Clone
description: A feature-rich CodePen clone for developers to experiment with and showcase front-end skills by creating, editing, and sharing live HTML, CSS, and JavaScript previews.

title: Portfolio
description: Designed and developed a personal portfolio website to showcase skills, projects and achievements, featuring a modern, responsive design with interactive elements for an optimal user experience.
